mapper.select: /* [chn.bhmc.dms.par.pmm.service.dao.BinLocationMasterDAO.selectBinLocationItemInfo] */ SELECT A.DLR_CD ,A.LOC_ID ,A.PLT_CD ,A.STRGE_CD ,A.LVL_ID ,A.LOC_CD ,A.LOC_NM ,A.UPPER_LOC_ID ,A.MAX_QTY ,A.LMT_MNG_YN ,A.ITEM_CD ,A.REMARK ,A.REG_USR_ID ,A.REG_DT ,A.UPDT_USR_ID ,A.UPDT_DT ,A.MAIN_LOC_YN ,A.UPPER_LVL_ID ,A.AVLB_STOCK_QTY ,A.RESV_STOCK_QTY ,A.CLAM_STOCK_QTY FROM PT_0222T A WHERE A.DLR_CD = #{dlrCd} AND A.PLT_CD = #{pltCd} AND A.STRGE_CD = #{strgeCd} AND A.LOC_CD = #{locCd} AND A.ITEM_CD = #{itemCd} AND rownum = 1

/* [chn.bhmc.dms.par.pmm.service.dao.BinLocationMasterDAO.selectBinLocationMasterComboByLevel] */ SELECT A.LOC_CD ,A.LOC_NM ,A.LVL_ID ,A.UPPER_LOC_ID FROM PT_0222T A INNER JOIN PT_0221T B ON A.DLR_CD = B.DLR_CD AND A.LVL_ID = B.LVL_ID WHERE A.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} --AND B.LAST_LVL_YN != 'Y' ORDER BY A.DLR_CD, A.LVL_ID, A.UPPER_LOC_ID, A.LOC_CD
